snippet: The measures include a ban on new purchases of assault weapons, a 10-bullet limit on magazines and a requirement that handgun buyers undergo fingerprinting and target training.
abstract: Maryland General Assembly passes sweeping restrictions on gun ownership, including ban on new purchases of assault weapons, 10-bullet limit on magazines and requirements that handgun buyers undergo fingerprinting and target training.
lead_paragraph: The measures include a ban on new purchases of assault weapons, a 10-bullet limit on magazines and a requirement that handgun buyers undergo fingerprinting and target training.

headline.seo: Increased Restrictions on Guns Pass Legislature in Maryland
headline.main: New Gun Restrictions Pass the Legislature in Maryland
headline.print_headline: New Gun Restrictions Pass The Legislature in Maryland
